name: @anglr/datetime
description: Angular library for datetime manipulation components

scripts.build: npm run build:datetime && npm run build:date-fns && npm run build:moment
scripts.clean: rimraf dist tests **/tsdoc-metadata.json src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.d.ts.map date-fns/**/*.d.ts date-fns/**/*.d.ts.map moment/**/*.d.ts moment/**/*.d.ts.map */*.metadata.json ./*.metadata.json ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map */dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:duplicates
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:datetime && npm run doc:generate:date-fns && npm run doc:generate:moment && npm run doc:save
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs ng-datetime" && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:datetime: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-datetime && npm run doc:json:datetime && npm run doc:md:datetime
scripts.doc:md:datetime: api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs/content/api/ng-datetime && rimraf temp
scripts.doc:generate:date-fns: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-datetime-date-fns && npm run doc:json:date-fns && npm run doc:md:date-fns
scripts.doc:md:date-fns: api-documenter markdown -i date-fns/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-datetime-date-fns && rimraf date-fns/temp
scripts.doc:generate:moment: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-datetime-moment && npm run doc:json:moment && npm run doc:md:moment
scripts.doc:md:moment: api-documenter markdown -i moment/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-datetime-moment && rimraf moment/temp

author: kukjevov
